meanings.sent1: The brave antifascist stood up against the oppressive regime.
meanings.sent2: Many people admire the antifascist for fighting against injustice.
meanings.sent3: The antifascist joked that even cats would be against fascism.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to be an antifascist was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the antifascist hero saved the town from tyranny.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of opposition to fascism.
meanings.sent1: The antifascist movement gained momentum in the country.
meanings.sent2: She wore an antifascist symbol on her jacket to show her beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The antifascist protest had colorful banners and music.
meanings.sent4: The antifascist message was clear in their powerful speeches.
meanings.sent5: The antifascist flag waved proudly in the wind during the rally.
